name: F-15 Strike Eagle: International Edition
overview: Strap into your ejection seat and get ready for challenging and exciting modern jet fighter combat with F-15 Strike Eagle! Fly combat missions, engage enemy aircraft, and destroy enemy ground targets in the skies of Southeast Asia, Europe and the Middle East. All the sophisticated tools of modern electronic air warfare are available including computer assisted targeting, heads-up display, airborne radar and ground tracking target display maps.
